actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide for contributions by the Federal Government to repair, restore, reconstruct, or replace nonprofit hospitals under the provisions of the Disaster Relief Act of 1970.

summary.text: Defines "public facility" under the Disaster Relief Act so as to make nonprofit hospitals eligible for contributions by the Federal Government to repair, restore, reconstruct, or replace such nonprofit hospitals.

titles.title: A bill to provide for contributions by the Federal Government to repair, restore, reconstruct, or replace nonprofit hospitals under the provisions of the Disaster Relief Act of 1970.
